CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 4, 1961, page 19, reads: "NCNW Prize-Winners - The above tables won the three top prizes at the Pittsburgh Council of the National Council of Negro Woman's Brotherhood Food Festival last Saturday at the Hotel Penn Sheraton. First prize went to the Inter-Se Club. The table featured a 'This is Your Life; book, with pictures of the local council president, Mrs. Mary White, and the first council president, Mrs. Daisy E. Lampkin, flanking that of the late Mrs. Mary McLeod Bethune, founder of the NCNW. Standing, left to right, Inter-Se Members are Mrs. Amelia Aston, Mrs. Betty Hutton, Mrs. Naomi Delphy and Mrs. Mary L. Walker. Second prize went to the Japanese table. Above are Mrs. Sachi Yajima and Mrs. Teikpo Nakano. Third prize was won by the TC Artists' table. Above are Mrs. Rose Milton, president; Mrs. Sarah Brown and Mrs. Jessie McMillen. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of three women, left to right: Rose Milton, Sarah Brown, and Jessie McMillen, gathered behind table with three Christmas tree shaped cookie trays and sign that reads "T & C Artists Associates" for the Pittsburgh Council of the National Council of Negro Woman's Brotherhood Food Festival at the Hotel Penn Sheraton
